title: Rebecca Romijn
summary: Rebecca Alie O'Connell[2][3] (née Romijn (/roʊˈmeɪn/ roh-MAYN; Dutch: [roːˈmɛin]); born November 6, 1972) is an American actress and former model. She is known for her role as Mystique in the trilogy of the X-Men film series, as Joan from The Punisher (2004) (both of which are based on Marvel Comics), and the dual roles of Laure Ash and Lily Watts in Femme Fatale (2002).[4][5][6] She has also had recurring roles as Alexis Meade on the television series Ugly Betty and as Number One on Star Trek: Discovery and Star Trek: Strange New Worlds. Her other major roles include Eve Baird on the TNT series The Librarians, voicing Lois Lane in the DC Animated Movie Universe (from The Death of Superman until Justice League Dark: Apokolips War), and as the host of the reality competition show Skin Wars.
